newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia's PM says unaware of Cabinet reshuffling.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia's PM says unaware of Cabinet reshuffling.

text.p: Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad on Thursday brushed aside rumours of a cabinet reshuffling.
"I have no idea at all about reshuffling of the cabinet," he said when asked at a news conference about persistent speculation that key cabinet members would be reassigned.

Talk that Mahathir's deputy, Anwar Ibrahim, would be made minister of rural development and lose his finance ministry job to International Trade and Industry Minister Rafidah Aziz has surfaced from time to time in the financial markets.
But Mahathir and Anwar have repeatedly denied such rumours.
